1.title: Senior React Developer

jobTabs.description: We are looking for a Senior React Developer to build high-performing web interfaces using TypeScript and React in a dynamic environment.
jobTabs.education: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience.

skillsAndExperience: Expertise in React, Redux, and TypeScript.
Experience with REST APIs and GraphQL.
Strong knowledge of modern JavaScript and testing libraries.
Node.js familiarity for backend integration.
Performance optimization and code splitting.

companyOverview.description: Google is an innovation-driven company aiming to organize the world’s information.

2.title: UX/UI Designer

jobTabs.description: As a UX/UI Designer at Figma, you'll create intuitive and delightful design experiences across our platform.
jobTabs.education: Degree in Design, HCI, or equivalent work experience.

skillsAndExperience: Strong design portfolio with UI/UX case studies.
Proficient in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite.
Knowledge of usability principles and responsive design.
Ability to create design systems and component libraries.

companyOverview.description: Figma is a web-based collaborative design tool helping teams design faster and together.

3.title: Product Manager

jobTabs.description: Lead cross-functional teams to define and deliver impactful product solutions. Influence strategy and own execution.
jobTabs.education: Bachelor’s in Business, CS, or related field. MBA preferred.

skillsAndExperience: Strong product strategy and roadmap planning.
Experience in Agile/Scrum environments.
Data-driven mindset with experience using analytics tools.
Strong stakeholder communication and leadership.

companyOverview.description: Amazon delivers innovation through its e-commerce, cloud, and logistics platforms.

4.title: DevOps Engineer

jobTabs.description: Support CI/CD automation and infrastructure scaling for global apps at Microsoft. Join a team driving DevOps excellence.
jobTabs.education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related technical field.

skillsAndExperience: Experience with Azure DevOps, Jenkins, or GitHub Actions.
Infrastructure as Code with Terraform or Bicep.
Kubernetes cluster management and Helm charts.
Proficiency in scripting (Bash, PowerShell, or Python).

companyOverview.description: Microsoft builds productivity tools and cloud infrastructure to empower the world.

5.title: Data Scientist

jobTabs.description: Work with business, engineering, and product teams to analyze data and build predictive models for member growth.
jobTabs.education: Master’s or Ph.D. in Data Science, Stats, or CS preferred.

skillsAndExperience: Expertise in Python, Pandas, and Scikit-learn.
Experience with SQL and data visualization tools.
Understanding of A/B testing and statistical inference.
Familiarity with Spark or big data pipelines is a plus.

companyOverview.description: LinkedIn connects professionals globally and offers career development insights.

6.title: Marketing Manager

jobTabs.description: Develop and execute growth-focused digital marketing strategies to scale Twitter’s engagement and outreach.
jobTabs.education: Bachelor's in Marketing, Communications, or relevant field.

skillsAndExperience: SEO/SEM and paid media strategy experience.
Analytics tools like GA4, HubSpot, or Mixpanel.
Email marketing and funnel optimization.
Creative content planning and social media management.

companyOverview.description: Twitter is a microblogging platform where ideas trend and global news breaks.
